alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Hopkins; Union; Webster (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 30 at 6:40PM EDT until June 30 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Crittenden County in western Kentucky... Hopkins County in northwestern Kentucky... Southeastern Union County in northwestern Kentucky... Western Webster County in northwestern Kentucky... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 539 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sturgis to near Madisonville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Madisonville, Providence, Sturgis, Earlington, Nortonville, Clay, Mortons Gap, Dixon, Hanson, Nebo and Wheatcroft. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 101 and 124. Western Kentucky Parkway near Mile Marker 39. Pennyrile Parkway near Mile Marker 34. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
